article.title: August 2013 Galaxy Update
article.content:
The August 2013 Galaxy Update is now available.

Highlights:

  • GCC2013 Report: Meeting summaries, and links to videos, talks, posters, and Training Day materials.
  • Two new public servers
  • 47 new papers
  • SlipStream: Galaxy is now available as an appliance
  • There's a new Galaxy-Ptotoemics mailing list
  • Open Positions at eight different organizations
  • Galaxy @ ISMB: links to slides and posters
  • Other Upcoming Events including training in California, Sydney, Italy, Toulouse, and Boston.
  • New CloudMan Release
  • Tool Shed Contributions
  • Other News

If you have anything you would like to see in the next Galaxy Update, please let us know.

Dave Clements and the Galaxy Team
